command_toggle_checking.description: Tooltip for toolbar button when checking for updates.

content_copied_entry.description: Overlay shown after copying an entry to the clipboard.

content_copied_fields.description: Overlay shown after copying entry as a tab-delimited fields to the clipboard.

content_copied_word.description: Overlay shown after copying a word to the clipboard.

content_copy_error.description: Message shown in overlay when we couldn't copy to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_entry_label.description: Label for key to copy a dictionary entry to the clipboard

content_copy_keys_next_label.description: Label for key to move the copy highlight to the next entry

content_copy_keys_word_label.description: Label for key to copy a word to the clipboard

options_accent_data_source.message: 声调数据来源于 Uros Ozvatic 的免费数据库。
options_accent_data_source.description: Attribution for pitch accent data as described here: https://github.com/mifunetoshiro/kanjium

options_accent_display_binary.description: Label for displaying the pitch accent using box outlines to show high and low

options_accent_display_downstep.description: Label for displaying the pitch accent down-step as a small downward arrow ꜜ

options_accent_display_label.description: Label for the drop-down list used to configure how pitch accent information is displayed

options_accent_display_none.description: Label for not showing pitch accent information

options_bushu_data_name.description: The name for the bushu database data set

options_cancel_update_button_label.description: Label for the button to cancel a database update

options_checking_for_updates.description: Label while we are checking for updates

options_data_source.message: 本词典含有来自 KANJIDIC 和 JMnedict/ENAMDICT 的资料。
options_data_source.description: Attribute of source data. Both the strings 'KANJIDIC' and 'JMnedict/ENAMDICT' must appear so that they can be link-ified to the corresponding project home pages.

options_db_update_error.description: Label when we failed to update the data for some reason

options_db_update_next_retry.description: Label used when there is a scheduled retry

options_downloading_data.description: Label while we are downloading updates

options_edrdg_license.message: 这些资料的所有权属于电子词典研究与开发小组（Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group），Rikaichamp 在 EDRDG 的许可协议的约束下使用它们。
options_edrdg_license.description: Description of license terms. The keywords 'Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group' and options_edrdg_license_keyword must appear so they can be linkified. IT SHOULD BEGIN WITH APPROPRIATE SPACE IN LANGUAGES THAT SEPARATE SENTENCES WITH WHITESPACE.

options_edrdg_license_keyword.description: The keyword in options_edrdg_license to link to the license

options_hold_to_show_keys_description.description: Typically Rikaichamp shows the popup whenever it is active, but if these keys are configured the popup while only show while they are held down

options_hold_to_show_keys_explanation.message: 在这里选择按键，按住这些按键时划词，才会显示 Rikaichamp 窗口。如果不选择任何按键，只要在 Rikaichamp 已启用时划词，就会显示窗口。
options_hold_to_show_keys_explanation.description: This is supplementary explanation to options_hold_to_show_keys_explanation

options_kanji_components.description: Option to define if radicals are displayed or not

options_kanji_data_name.description: The name for the kanji database data set

options_kanji_data_title.description: The kanji data series title and version

options_kanji_dictionary_heading.description: Heading for options to configure what information is displayed from the kanji dictionary

options_keyboard_heading.description: Heading for options to configure keyboard commands

options_last_database_check.description: Status to show when we last checked for an update

options_name_data_name.description: The name for the name database data set

options_name_data_title.description: The name data series title and version

options_no_database.description: Label when the database has not yet been downloaded

options_offline_explanation.message: 无法检查更新，因为没有连接到互联网。一旦设备联网，Rikaichamp 会再次检查更新。
options_offline_explanation.description: Message shown when the system is offline so updates cannot be performed

options_popup_copy_fields.message: 复制以制表符分隔的内容

options_popup_style_heading.description: Heading for options to configure popup display

options_pos_display_code.description: Label for simply display dictionary part-of-speech codes

options_pos_display_expl.description: Label for configuring short explanations to be shown for part-of-speech. The "-ru Godan/u-verb" example should correspond to the localized value of pos_label_v5r.

options_pos_display_label.description: Label for the drop-down list used to configure how part-of-speech tags are displayed

options_show_context_menu_item.message: 右键菜单中添加“启用 Rikaichamp”
options_show_context_menu_item.description: Option to enable context menu item with label `menu_enable_extension`

options_show_priority.message: 显示高频率（★）和较高频率（☆）的标志
options_show_priority.description: Label for enabling the ★ and ☆ markers next to dictionary headwords to indicate they occur frequently  or somewhat frequently respectively

options_update_check_button_label.description: Label for the button to check for database updates

options_update_retry_button_label.description: Label for the button to retry the database update after a failure

options_updating_data.description: Label while we are applying updates

options_warning_language_is_kanji_only.message: 本设定目前只对汉字词典有效。

pos_label_adj-f.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun or verb entries acting prenominally

pos_label_adj-i.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adjective (keiyoushi) entries

pos_label_adj-ix.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adjective (keiyoushi) - yoi/ii class entries

pos_label_adj-kari.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to 'kari' adjective (archaic) entries

pos_label_adj-ku.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to 'ku' adjective (archaic) entries

pos_label_adj-na.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adjectival nouns or quasi-adjectives (keiyodoshi) entries

pos_label_adj-nari.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to archaic/formal form of na-adjective entries

pos_label_adj-no.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no' entries

pos_label_adj-pn.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to pre-noun adjectival (rentaishi) entries

pos_label_adj-shiku.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to 'shiku' adjective (archaic) entries

pos_label_adj-t.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to 'taru' adjective entries

pos_label_adv.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adverb (fukushi) entries

pos_label_adv-to.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adverb taking the 'to' particle entries

pos_label_aux.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to auxiliary entries

pos_label_aux-adj.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to auxiliary adjective entries

pos_label_aux-v.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to auxiliary verb entries

pos_label_conj.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to conjunction entries

pos_label_cop.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to copula entries

pos_label_ctr.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to counter entries

pos_label_exp.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to expressions (phrases, clauses, etc.) entries

pos_label_int.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to interjection (kandoushi) entries

pos_label_n.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun (common) (futsuumeishi) entries

pos_label_n-adv.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to adverbial noun (fukushitekimeishi) entries

pos_label_n-pr.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to proper noun entries

pos_label_n-pref.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun, used as a prefix entries

pos_label_n-suf.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun, used as a suffix entries

pos_label_n-t.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun (temporal) (jisoumeishi) entries

pos_label_num.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to numeric entries

pos_label_pn.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to pronoun entries

pos_label_pref.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to prefix entries

pos_label_prt.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to particle entries

pos_label_suf.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to suffix entries

pos_label_unc.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to unclassified entries

pos_label_v-unspec.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to verb unspecified entries

pos_label_v1.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Ichidan verb entries

pos_label_v1-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Ichidan verb - kureru special class entries

pos_label_v2a-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb with 'u' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2b-k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (upper class) with 'bu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2b-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'bu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2d-k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (upper class) with 'dzu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2d-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'dzu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2g-k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (upper class) with 'gu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2g-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'gu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2h-k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (upper class) with 'hu/fu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2h-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'hu/fu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2k-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'ku' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2n-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'nu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2r-k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (upper class) with 'ru' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2r-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'ru' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2s-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'su' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2t-k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (upper class) with 'tsu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2t-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'tsu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2w-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'u' ending and 'we' conjugation (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2y-k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (upper class) with 'yu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v2y-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Nidan verb (lower class) with 'yu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v4k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Yodan verb with 'ku' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v4m.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Yodan verb with 'mu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v4n.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Yodan verb with 'nu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v4r.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Yodan verb with 'ru' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v4s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Yodan verb with 'su' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v4t.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Yodan verb with 'tsu' ending (archaic) entries

pos_label_v5aru.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb - -aru special class entries

pos_label_v5b.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'bu' ending entries

pos_label_v5g.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'gu' ending entries

pos_label_v5k.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'ku' ending entries

pos_label_v5k-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb - Iku/Yuku special class entries

pos_label_v5m.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'mu' ending entries

pos_label_v5n.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'nu' ending entries

pos_label_v5r.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'ru' ending entries

pos_label_v5r-i.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'ru' ending (irregular verb) entries

pos_label_v5s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'su' ending entries

pos_label_v5t.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'tsu' ending entries

pos_label_v5u.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'u' ending entries

pos_label_v5u-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb with 'u' ending (special class) entries

pos_label_v5uru.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Godan verb - Uru old class verb (old form of Eru) entries (this doesn't appear to be used)

pos_label_vi.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to intransitive verb entries

pos_label_vk.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Kuru verb - special class entries

pos_label_vn.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to irregular nu verb entries

pos_label_vr.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to irregular ru verb, plain form ends with -ri entries

pos_label_vs.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru entries

pos_label_vs-c.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to su verb - precursor to the modern suru entries

pos_label_vs-i.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to suru verb - included entries

pos_label_vs-s.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to suru verb - special class entries

pos_label_vt.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to transitive verb entries

pos_label_vz.description: Short part-of-speech label shown next to Ichidan verb - zuru verb (alternative form of -jiru verbs) entries

ref_label_jlpt.description: The label used when presenting the level the kanji appears in in the old JLPT system

ref_label_kk.description: The label used when presenting Kanji Kentei levels

ref_label_nelson_r.description: The label used when presenting Nelson's revised radical numbers. This should generally be a label that will sort directly after ref_label_radical when using String.localCompare.

ref_label_py.description: The label used when present the Pinyin reading

ref_label_radical.description: The label used when presenting radical numbers

ref_label_unicode.description: The label used when presenting the Unicode codepoint of the kanji
